recipesJson.description: After I few tries Iâ€™ve finally nailed this one down. Tastes just like the treat. Great off the shake and will get even better.

reviews.text: This is such a simple yet delicious vape. I don't think I have ever had the real thing to compare for authenticity but I am really digging this.  Its flavorful yet mellow enough to be vaped on all day.
